title: Carolla Classics: Mike Lynch Book Discussions
itunes:title: Carolla Classics: Mike Lynch Book Discussions
description:
Clips of Mike Lynch and Adam discussing Adam's previous book releases. Plus, we hear a round of Tales from the Cheap.

"Everything Reminds Me of Something: Advice, Answers... but No Apologies" is available for preorder on Amazon and AdamCarolla.com! Out July 19.

Hosted by Chris Laxamana and Giovanni Giorgio

Support the show:
Visit Geico.com
Check out The Jordan Harbinger Podcast
